snippet: Frank Codispoti represents Brooklyn at the crossroads; his hair salon is in a fancy new hotel, but his camaraderie has fostered generations of loyal customers.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column; barber Frank Codispoti, who owns the Allegria Hair Salon in the Brooklyn Marriott in Downtown Brooklyn, has loyal and devoted customers of several generations.
lead_paragraph: Frank Codispoti represents Brooklyn at the crossroads; his hair salon is in a fancy new hotel, but his camaraderie has fostered generations of loyal customers.

headline.print_headline: A Little Off the Sides, Camaraderie on Top
